verses.roman:
e śarīra dharibāre kabhu nā yuyāya
ei duḥkhe jvale deha, prāṇa nāhi yāya

synonyms: e śarīra—this body; dharibāre—to keep; kabhu—ever; nā—not; yuyāya—deserve; ei duḥkhe—in this unhappiness; jvale deha—my body is burning; prāṇa—my life; nāhi yāya—does not go away.
translation: "Sir, due to my unhappiness I cannot continue living. Although my body is burning, my life is not leaving."
